english.segment1: I believe the promess ('bout). That the visions and the dreams. That the Holy Spirit will be pour out (?). And His power will be seen
english.segment2: Well, the time is now. The place is Here. And His people has came in faith. There's a mighty shout. And a touch of fire. When We get in your place
english.segment3: I believe that the presence of Goid is Here. There's no one thing that can't be change. Whe the Spirit of God is Here. I believe the the presence of God is Here. When two or three are 'gether. And people rising faith. I believe God answers and His presence is in this place
english.segment4: No thing on earth, or heaven (?). Can't stop the fire of God. Into our hands is given. God calls to take it all
english.segment5: No ocean can contain us. No star can rise above. Into our hearts is given. The power of His love
